name: Sourcegraph for GitHub
description: Gives GitHub IDE powers: jump to definition, doc tooltips, and semantic code search in the GitHub file browser and code review
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src 'self' https://sourcegraph-logging.telligentdata.com; style-src * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:;
